mapper.select: select id, avg_score, key_words, tip, interview_url, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted from interview_history where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into interview_history(avg_score, key_words, tip, interview_url, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{avgScore}, #{keyWords}, #{tip}, #{interviewUrl}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into interview_history(avg_score, key_words, tip, interview_url, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.avgScore}, #{entity.keyWords}, #{entity.tip}, #{entity.interviewUrl}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into interview_history(avg_score, key_words, tip, interview_url, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.avgScore}, #{entity.keyWords}, #{entity.tip}, #{entity.interviewUrl}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update avg_score = values(avg_score), key_words = values(key_words), tip = values(tip), interview_url = values(interview_url), created_by = values(created_by), created_time = values(created_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update interview_history
avg_score = #{avgScore},
key_words = #{keyWords},
tip = #{tip},
interview_url = #{interviewUrl},
created_by = #{createdBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where id = #{id}
